DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Computed Tomography Lymphoma Outcome Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: List of disease response types related to the CT scan outcome for a lymphoma patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Computed Tomography Lymphoma Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the CT scan outcome for a lymphoma patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

Property.preferredDefinition: A method of examining structures within the body by scanning them with X rays and using a computer to construct a series of cross-sectional scans along a single axis.:A malignant (clonal) proliferation of B- lymphocytes or T- lymphocytes which involves the lymph nodes, bone marrow and/or extranodal sites. This category includes Non-Hodgkin lymphomas and Hodgkin lymphomas.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: A method of examining structures within the body by scanning them with X rays and using a computer to construct a series of cross-sectional scans along a single axis.

A malignant (clonal) proliferation of B- lymphocytes or T- lymphocytes which involves the lymph nodes, bone marrow and/or extranodal sites. This category includes Non-Hodgkin lymphomas and Hodgkin lymphomas.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to COG for by script Thu Jan 2 10:00:57 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: List of disease response types related to the CT scan outcome for a lymphoma patient.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Greater than 50% increase in PPD of any of the nodal masses OR Development of new  measurable lesions

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Greater than 50% increase in PPD of any of the nodal masses OR Development of new  measurable lesions
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Greater than 50% increase in PPD of any of the nodal masses OR Development of new  measurable lesions

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Less than 50% decrease AND less than 50% increase in sum of PPD of any of the nodal masses with No new lesions

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Less than 50% decrease AND less than 50% increase in sum of PPD of any of the nodal masses with No new lesions
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Less than 50% decrease AND less than 50% increase in sum of PPD of any of the nodal masses with No new lesions

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Less than complete disappearance but greater than 50% decrease in sum of PPD of up to 6 of the largest nodal masses

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Less than complete disappearance but greater than 50% decrease in sum of PPD of up to 6 of the largest nodal masses
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Less than complete disappearance but greater than 50% decrease in sum of PPD of up to 6 of the largest nodal masses

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Complete disappearance of all target nodal masses OR mass of any size

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Complete disappearance of all target nodal masses OR mass of any size
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Complete disappearance of all target nodal masses OR mass of any size

PermissibleValues.value: Not complete response, but not progressive disease
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Not complete response, but not progressive disease

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Not complete response, but not progressive disease
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not complete response, but not progressive disease

PermissibleValues.value: All target nodal masses return to normal size
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: All target nodal masses return to normal size

ValueMeaning.preferredName: All target nodal masses return to normal size
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: All target nodal masses return to normal size
